ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What was it that brought you to Hell?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: What has caused you to enter Hell"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What has brought you into hell?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What hath brought you to this burning?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What has brought you into the Fire of Hell ?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: What led you into the Scorching Fire?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What led you into Hell Fire?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: What has caused you to enter Hell?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What caused you to be thrust into the Scorching (Fire)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:42]   ‘What has landed you in, [what has] made you enter, Saqar?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: so-and-so (What hath brought you to this burning?
